name: hello-microverse
description: > One h1 Tittle about the project. > Create branches with different base branches. > Understand the concept of version control. > Follow GitHub flow. > Open pull requests in GitHub. > Write descriptive, easy to understand commit messages. > Write short, detailed, easy to understand descriptions of pull requests. > Write a descriptive and easy to understand README in business English for every project submitted. > Demonstrate an ability to submit a project for code review.. ![screenshot](./app_screenshot.png)
